description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on the role of a lone survivor of the great Carrot Massacre. After the slaughter of friends and family there is only one option available... Revenge. With nothing left to lose this one root army must take as many sammiches with him to hell as he can.
